eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}\label{2.20}
dS^2 &=& -e^{-2\hat{U}}\, \left(1-{2M_0\over r}\right)dT^2 \\
     && +e^{2(\hat{V}-\hat{U}+u)}\, \left(1-{2M_0\over r}\right)^{-1}\, dr^2 \nonumber\\
     && +e^{2(\hat{V}-\hat{U}+u)}\, r^2\, \left(d\theta^2+e^{-2\hat{V}}\, \sin^2\theta\, d\phi^2\right)\, .\nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}\label{3.18}
G^{(3)}_{\cal M}({\bf x},{\bf x}') &=& \int\limits_{-\infty}^{\infty}\, dW\,
G^{(4,\text{reg})}_{\cal M}({\bf X},{\bf X}') \\
 &&\hspace{1.5em} -{1\over 16\pi^2 L}\, \ln (\sigma^2+b^2)\, . \nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}\label{3.45a}
l(\mu)
  &=& 2\int\limits_{\mu}^{\pi}\, dz\, e^{-U(0,z)}\\
  &\approx& 2(4\pi)^{-\mu/\pi}\, \int\limits_{\mu}^{\pi}\, dz\, \sqrt{{(z+\mu)(2\pi-z+\mu)\over (z-\mu)(2\pi-z-\mu)}}\nonumber\\
  &=&\textstyle
   2\sqrt{\pi^2-\mu^2}\, E(\varphi,k)\,
   +2\mu \sqrt{ {\pi+\mu\over \pi-\mu}}\, F(\varphi,k)\,
   -(\pi-\mu)\, ,\hspace{-1em}\nonumber
\

     && +e^{2(\hat{V}-\hat{U}+u)}\, \left(1-{2M_0\over r}\right)^{-1}\, dr^2 \nonumber\\
     && +e^{2(\hat{V}-\hat{U}+u)}\, r^2\, \left(d\theta^2+e^{-2\hat{V}}\, \sin^2\theta\, d\phi^2\right)\, .\nonumber
